| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 4 |  | ldual1.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` D ) |

| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |

| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( 1r ` S ) = ( 1r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 2 | #P_oppr1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5, 10 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> I = .1. ) |
